name: single_budget_12k
description: Single budget value with subscriber calculation
user_message: Find tech creators with a budget of $12,000

name: budget_range_100_10000
description: Budget range parsing - tricky formatting
user_message: I need gaming creators with 100-10000$ budget

name: budget_range_with_k
description: Budget with K notation
user_message: Find beauty influencers, budget 5K-15K

name: tiktok_request
description: User asks for TikTok - should inform YouTube only
user_message: I want TikTok creators for my fashion campaign, budget $8000

name: instagram_request
description: User asks for Instagram creators
user_message: Find Instagram fitness influencers in LA with 20K budget

name: multi_platform_request
description: User asks for multiple platforms
user_message: I need lifestyle creators on YouTube or Instagram, budget 10K-25K, audience 25-40

name: specific_country
description: Search with specific country
user_message: Find food creators in Japan with $15,000 budget targeting foodies aged 25-45

name: multiple_countries
description: Multiple country request
user_message: I want travel vloggers in US, UK, or Canada, budget 50K

name: city_instead_of_country
description: User provides city instead of country
user_message: Find tech reviewers in San Francisco, budget $30,000

name: mixed_budget_results
description: Results should have clear budget status indicators
user_message: Find 5 cooking channels with budget $8,000-$12,000

name: high_budget_search
description: High budget should find larger creators
user_message: Find tech creators with $100,000 budget

name: missing_category
description: Budget provided but no category
user_message: I have a budget of $15,000 for influencer marketing

name: missing_budget
description: Category provided but no budget
user_message: I'm looking for fitness creators on YouTube

name: complete_info_first_message
description: All required info in first message
user_message: Find 3 gaming YouTubers in US with budget $20K-$40K, targeting gamers aged 18-30

name: refine_search_request
description: User wants to refine previous search
user_message: Can you find similar creators but in Europe instead?

name: fashion_influencers_instagram_tiktok
description: Find fashion influencers on Instagram and TikTok targeting Gen Z and young professionals
user_message: I need fashion influencers on Instagram and TikTok for Gen Z and young professionals, 50K-500K followers, min 3% engagement

name: tech_reviewers_youtube
description: Find tech review YouTubers for gaming audience
user_message: Find tech review YouTubers with 100K-1M subscribers who create video reviews for tech enthusiasts and gamers

name: linkedin_thought_leaders_b2b
description: Find LinkedIn thought leaders for B2B audience
user_message: I want LinkedIn thought leaders with 10K-100K followers focused on business strategy for B2B decision makers

name: test_case_1_happy_path_single_budget
description: Tests the agent's ability to process all required and optional information for a single budget, calculate follower range, and call the find_creators tool.
user_message: I need 5 food creators on Instagram in New York City, targeting millennials interested in healthy eating. My budget is $12,000.

name: test_case_2_happy_path_budget_range
description: Tests processing a budget range, calculating follower range using min_price * 6 and max_price * 20, and calling the find_creators tool.
user_message: I have a budget range of $6,000 to $24,000 for travel influencers. I need 10 creators.
expected_response_contains: Based on your budget range of $6,000-$24,000

name: test_case_3_missing_category_and_budget
description: Tests the agent's ability to identify and ask for both missing required pieces of information: category and budget.
user_message: I need creators in London, targeting Gen Z.

name: test_case_4_missing_budget_only
description: Tests the agent's ability to identify and ask for only the missing required budget.
user_message: I need some beauty bloggers for my new skincare line.

name: test_case_5_partial_info_follow_up_optional
description: Tests the agent's ability to collect required info, then ask for optional details (platform, location, target audience) in a follow-up.
user_message: I need food bloggers, budget $5000.

name: test_case_6_complex_target_audience_and_platform
description: Tests handling of specific platform, age keyword, and multiple interests in target audience, along with budget.
user_message: Find tech creators on YouTube, budget $10,000, target Gen Z interested in gaming and new gadgets.

name: test_case_7_budget_range_unusual_format
description: Tests the agent's robustness in parsing budget ranges with non-standard formatting.
user_message: I'm looking for lifestyle creators, my budget is from $7,500 to $25,000 dollars.
expected_response_contains: Based on your budget range of $7,500-$25,000

name: test_case_8_very_low_budget_single
description: Tests budget calculation and explanation for a very low single budget value.
user_message: I need beauty creators, budget $100, any platform.

name: test_case_9_no_results_scenario_agent_response
description: Tests the agent's response when the find_creators tool returns no results, suggesting criteria adjustment. This assumes the tool call has been made and returned no results.
user_message: Find fitness creators in Antarctica for $5000.

session_context.last_tool_call_result: No creators found matching the criteria.

name: test_case_10_correction_and_refinement_multi_turn
description: Tests the agent's ability to handle multi-turn conversation, update criteria, and incorporate new details from a follow-up message.
user_message: Actually, make it London, and budget $8,000. Target young adults.

session_context.last_agent_message: Hello! I'd be happy to help you find fashion influencers. To find the best matches, I need to know: What's your total campaign budget? Which platform do you prefer? (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, or any) Who is your target audience?
